bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
uthash-1.9.9-10.fc24 fails to build from source. This affects Base Runtime, Rawhide, and F25.
The reason is an undeclared build dependency on perl which is executed during the build phase to run checks. Perl is no longer included in the default buildroot.
This can be easily fixed by adding a BuildRequires for perl.
Please apply the patch or respond with a reason it should not be applied within two weeks. After that time, a provenpackager will go ahead and apply it.
Created attachment 1231886 proposed patch to correct FTBFS issue

Comment on attachment 1231886 proposed patch to correct FTBFS issue
Needed BR: perl has been added while updating the package to v2.0.1 [1]. Build succeded on Rawhide.
[1] https://koji.fedoraproject.org/koji/buildinfo?buildID=826365
